articles.title: 'Empty void': Genie Bouchard opens up on uncertain tennis future - Yahoo Sport Australia
articles.description: The ongoing uncertainty in international tennis has been putting Genie Bouchard on edge.
articles.content:
Canadian tennis star Eugenie Bouchard has opened up about how the global coronavirus (COVID-19) pandemic has left her feeling as though shes in an empty void.
